channel.title: Homesick - Tome (Indie Pop)
channel.description:
yo ! this is my new song "homesick" ! you can listen to it [here](https://soundcloud.com/melodiesbytome/homesick) and watch its nature-y music video [here](https://youtu.be/JtcGOdRnXrg)
the track is 100% auxy ,except only for the luscious strings
the track is about indecisiveness, and this was written a year ago. it was supposed to be an ep with my song "free" but that i thought it would be overkill since there arent a lot of people that listen to my song.
hope you like it !

item.title: Homesick - Tome (Indie Pop)
item.dc:creator: melodiesbytome
item.description:
ill be willing to talk to you abt mixing but though im not a pro (idk technical stuff) and most of the time its just luck if it blends well lol

Read full topic

item.title: Homesick - Tome (Indie Pop)
item.dc:creator: anon86704580
item.description:
Melody is nice and chill. Love the drums, simple and effective. Same with the lead. Man, you need to give me vocal lessons Or at least with mixing vocals. I love this man! This community is so diverse I don’t care what anyone says.

Read full topic

item.title: Homesick - Tome (Indie Pop)
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
Awesome man, not much to say critically, I like it. Great vocal tone as always (channeling JT as far as I’m concerned), the track flows nicely, just keep them coming
